text:
California had a record 7,149 new confirmed coronavirus cases Tuesday — a 69% increase — Gov. Gavin Newsom said Wednesday. 

He warned Californians to be careful in socializing: “We are putting people’s lives at risk."

https://t.co/zxArtbyyFZ
